about us
Chima Steakhouse, named after chimarrao, a traditional drink of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil, that symbolizes hospitality and friendship-certainly lives up to its name.Legend has it that, in South Brazil traditional gauchos (cowboys) would consume a diet that consisted almost entirely of beef. The meat was seasoned, placed on skewers, and slow cooked over a wood burning flame. Historically, gauchos were known for their generosity and hospitality.The first Chima restaurant originated in Uberlandia, Brazil located in the state of Minas Gerais. In 2003, the Silva family introduced a new style of dining and superior service to Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Chima combined traditional Brazilian rodizio and excellent service with an elegant setting.
Sharing a one-of-a-kind experience
Appetizers
Salad bar
Dessert
Chima Chef
Gauchos - Meat Chef
The word “gaucho” comes originally from the Spanish and Portuguese languages and describes the cattle herders in South America. Churrasco dominates the diet of the Gauchos, and it means the way the meats are cooked over open flames on skewers. At Chima Steakhouse, each Gaucho is responsible for cooking and serving the meat. They roam the dining room with skewers of meat (top sirloin, filet mignon, ribeye, lamb chops, chicken, salmon, shrimp, and more), and once you are ready to start your Chima experience, simply flip the token to the “yes” side and let the show begin! We encourage you to try all the options we offer and explore all the wonderful flavors of perfectly grilled meats.
Special Occasions
Elevate your milestone birthday or anniversary party by celebrating in our private and semi-private event spaces. A comfortable room, an elegant table setting, a customized menu with world-class wines, and a dedicated staff providing gracious, anticipatory service. Each Chima’s location has a dedicated Sales and Event Manager who will take charge of every last detail to make your event a seamless success.
We have available different packages that provide easy buying decisions for you by including many options for one price. With the great value we build into the package, we can meet or beat your budget while your guests enjoy all we have to offer.
Start planning now
A comfortable room, an elegant table setting, an all inclusive menu with world-class wines, and a dedicated staff providing gracious, anticipatory service. Our private VIP rooms are ideal for seminars, presentations, conferences, client dinners and other corporate events.
Whether closing a deal, launching a new product, celebrating a company anniversary or hosting a board meeting, Chima is the perfect venue for any occasion!Contact us for packages and VIP room availability.
Are you looking for a full private event venue? You may also consider a buyout. Your Guests can enjoy exclusive venue access to our restaurant’s bar area, main dining room and private dining spaces.
Your wedding isn’t about one day … It’s about a series of events and celebrations that lead up to the most important day in your life. From the moment he proposes until you hug the last relative good-bye, Chima’s private facilities are ideal. We also offer a buyout option, where your guests can enjoy exclusive venue access to our restaurant’s bar area, main dining room and private dining spaces.
Private Wedding Proposals
Engagement Parties
Bridal Showers
Grooms Dinner
Rehearsal Dinners
Wedding Ceremonies
Wedding Receptions
Post-Wedding Breakfasts or Lunches
After all-nighters and countless exams…is finally time to celebrate! We want to help you to celebrate the completion of this journey and the start of the next! As you know Chima’s menu is filled with delicious blends of Brazilian and American favorites. Whether you’re in the mood for one of our delicious specialty meats, or if you’d like to enjoy a salad from our gourmet salad bar.
Get in touch with our local events & sales manager for packages and booking by clicking the button below.
Treat the mom-to-be to an afternoon or evening of first-class treatment and delectable food. We can host this party in our private or semi-private dining rooms and transform the space into a more feminine, celebratory and fun environment that will impress your guest of honor and her friends and family. We also offer an hors d’oeuvres menu available for parties at our bar & lounge areas. Our dedicated local event planning professional can help you create the perfect menu, paired with champagne cocktails or more pregnant-friendly beverages.
*Venue buyout available upon request.
Chima would be honored to be your chosen location for this celebratory occasion among your family, friends, and members of your community. Our dedicated events and sales manager will help you choose the best party package and pairing for this important rite of passage.

/**
* jQuery Timepicker - v1.3.5 - 2016-07-10
* http://timepicker.co
*
* Enhances standard form input fields helping users to select (or type) times.
* Copyright (c) 2016 Willington Vega; Licensed MIT, GPL
*/
.ui-timepicker-container{position:absolute;overflow:hidden;box-sizing:border-box}.ui-timepicker{box-sizing:content-box;display:block;height:205px;list-style:none outside none;margin:0;padding:0 1px;text-align:center}.ui-timepicker-viewport{box-sizing:content-box;display:block;height:205px;margin:0;padding:0;overflow:auto;overflow-x:hidden}.ui-timepicker-standard{font-family:Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:1.1em;background-color:#FFF;border:1px solid #AAA;color:#222;margin:0;padding:2px}.ui-timepicker-standard a{border:1px solid transparent;color:#222;display:block;padding:.2em .4em;text-decoration:none}.ui-timepicker-standard .ui-state-hover{background-color:#DADADA;border:1px solid #999;font-weight:400;color:#212121}.ui-timepicker-standard .ui-menu-item{margin:0;padding:0}.ui-timepicker-corners,.ui-timepicker-corners .ui-corner-all{-moz-border-radius:4px;-webkit-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px}.ui-timepicker-hidden{display:none}.ui-timepicker-no-scrollbar .ui-timepicker{border:0}

ease-out;transition:all 300ms ease-out}.hfe-nav-menu:before,.hfe-nav-menu:after{content:'';display:table;clear:both}.hfe-nav-menu__align-right
